detail_desc: Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
Fancy dress wig made from coloured synthetic hair. Textile lining with an elasticated edge.
Hipster briefs in mesh and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and at the crotch. One patterned and one in a solid colour.
Shorts in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Long, wide trousers woven in a cotton blend with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pockets in the side seams, a jetted back pocket and wide, straight legs with creases.
Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Front fastening. Can be washed and reused.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck, ties at the top, a double layer of fabric front and back and long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with long sleeves with a drawstring that ties at the cuffs. Deep opening at the back, button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Set with a double-layered hairband and triangular scarf in soft jersey. Patterned hairband with a knot detail at the front. Scarf with a print motif on one side and press-studs at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, gently dropped shoulders and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Trainers in imitation suede with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings, cotton insoles and a fabric trim around the soles.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved dress in fine-knit organic cotton with a round, frill-trimmed neckline, a hole pattern at the top and a gently flared, stocking-stitched skirt.

Shirt in a cotton and cupro weave with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight style with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The cupro content of the shirt is recycled.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cargo trousers in a lightweight cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, and flap leg and back pockets with a press-stud. Tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Christmas jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Brazilian briefs in jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high cut at the back and high-cut legs.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a crisp cotton weave with concealed elastication.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 1.3 cm to 4 cm.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Flat leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal detailing and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Jersey cap in a cotton blend with an inner terry sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

prod_name: SB Henry water resi ski jkt TP
detail_desc: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and zipped front pockets. Inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Textured-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and rolled edges.
Sleeveless dresses in printed jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with press-studs, and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in size 4-12M.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves. The fingerless gloves have a print motif on the uppers. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Knitted dress for a dog with pompoms on the back and ribbed flounces at the hem. Ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling with a drawstring and small appliqué at the top, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Treggings in stretch, patterned twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, wide ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

prod_name: Cali HW wide leg dnm trs
detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.
Jumper in a soft fine-knit viscose blend with a collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder dress in soft viscose jersey with a stripe print. Elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and high slits in the sides.
Skirt in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Bibs in water-repellent material with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the neck and a spill pocket at the bottom.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, hooded jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring at the top, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with elastication at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Tube top in a patterned viscose weave with elastication and a small frill at the top and a small opening with ties at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and flared hem.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with narrow elastication and overlocked frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved shirt in wide-wale corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees.
Straight trousers in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.

Spacious handbag in imitation suede and imitation leather with two handles with a metal chain section and a magnetic press-stud fastener at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 9x31x39 cm.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Polo shirt in striped cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (7.5-11.5) and one pair in a child size.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft velour. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Skirt in glittery tulle with an elasticated waist and satin underskirt.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a gathered flounce at the front and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a polo neck and short sleeves. Unlined.
Padded bootees in soft velour with appliqués on the feet and a high, ribbed shaft. Jersey linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Short dress in a sturdy weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length puff sleeves and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined. The dress is made partly from Tencel™ lyocell.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Calf-length trousers in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high waist that has covered elastication at the back. Front pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Long, wide trousers woven in a cotton blend with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pockets in the side seams, a jetted back pocket and wide, straight legs with creases.
Tops in soft, ribbed jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
